statements: SELECT * FROM cocktail_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name, quantity, price FROM cocktail_orders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_date, cocktail_name, quantity FROM cocktail_orders WHERE order_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM cocktail_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_amount FROM cocktail_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_orders WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM cocktail_orders GROUP BY cocktail_name;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM cocktail_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM cocktail_orders WHERE price > 50;
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktail_orders WHERE quantity = 1 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT name, price FROM cocktails WHERE category = 'Margarita';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM cocktails;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category FROM cocktails WHERE category = 'Margarita' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM cocktails c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.cocktail_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE category = 'Rum' OR category = 'Vodka' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM cocktails;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name, order_date FROM cocktail_orders WHERE cocktail_name = 'Mojito';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_city FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 25;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price < 10.00;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name, order_date FROM cocktail_orders WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_city FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price < 10.00;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_city FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_price DESC;
SELECT order_date, quantity, total_price FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2 AND cocktail_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, cocktail_name, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price > 10 ORDER BY cocktail_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, cocktail_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;
SELECT c.cocktail_name, p.rating FROM cocktails c JOIN preferences p ON c.cocktail_id = p.cocktail_id WHERE p.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_type, cocktail_price FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_type = 'Mocktail';
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM order_details od JOIN ingredients i ON od.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_type, cocktail_price FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_type = 'Martini';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT cocktails.cocktail_name, ingredients.ingredient_name, quantity FROM cocktails JOIN order_details ON cocktails.cocktail_id = order_details.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON order_details.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 1;
